# Teras Beach jõuluüritus 2025

Kutsume Teid koos kolleegidega veetma sel aastal oma jõulupidu ehtsas troopikas.
**Teras Beach JÕULUÜRITUS toimub 5. detsembril algusega kell 18:30.**

Kui soovite eduka aasta lõppu tähistada meeldejäävalt ja ilma korraldusmuredeta, on Teras Beach jõuluüritus ideaalne valik. Alates tervitusjoogist kuni õhtu viimaste muusikataktideni on kõik teie eest ära korraldatud ning teil jääb ainult kohale tulemise vaev. Kuna meil on aastaringselt 26-kraadi ning pehme rannaliiv, siis isegi talvejoped ja -saapad saab ideeliselt koju jätta.

**Mida oodata?**

**PILETID:**

**AJAKAVA:**

18.30 - Uksed avatud, tervitusjook ja -suupiste

19.20 - 19.25 - Avashow

19.25 - 19.30 - Tervitussõnad

19.30 - Õhtusöök serveeritud

20.20 - 20.40 - Üllatusesineja rahva seas

20.45 - 21.15 - Pille-Riin & The Wet Cats

21.20 - 21.40 - Tantsu-töötuba

21.45 - 22.15 - Pille-Riin & The Wet Cats

22.20 - Magustoit serveeritud

22.40 - 23.10 Pille-Riin & The Wet Cats

23.15 - Teras Beach’i eri: Suvine rannapidu

01.30 - Ürituse lõpp

**Piletite soetamiseks kirjuta meile info(ät)terasbeach.ee või helista 5623 4404**

# Teras Beach

26 degrees, white sand, Beach Lounge and Saunas make it the best Indoor Beach Hall in the world.

Play beach volleyball, beach tennis or host your next event on our warm white sand.

Welcome!

![](data:image/jpg;base64,)
![Events](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=500&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F7lFGVy19n5OkAhlAZSoyEt%2Fb6b6d3103e9d08fe7789cfed07b0b0f8%2FR_K_5720.jpg&cd=2021-11-01T20%3A10%3A08.684Z)
![Events](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=500&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F7lFGVy19n5OkAhlAZSoyEt%2Fb6b6d3103e9d08fe7789cfed07b0b0f8%2FR_K_5720.jpg&cd=2021-11-01T20%3A10%3A08.684Z)

# Events

Host your next party, seminar or company party with us! We cater for all types of events and sizes, our professional production team will make it happen for you!

![](data:image/jpg;base64,)
![Groups](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=500&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F77FdHDpptZmiF8jnyxYe5o%2F4a78ab7518f1b0a7360800cc102de8a5%2FDSC07261.JPG&cd=2022-03-04T09%3A33%3A35.184Z)

# Groups

SPORT + SAUNA

BEACH VOLLEY/TENNIS EXPERIENCE

KIDS BIRTHDAYS

![](data:image/jpg;base64,)
![Sport](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=500&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F4gm5VY0fO0qMWa2Arw1XhO%2Fe5af31d6446713fdd5315ed6f7326bb5%2Fbeach-volley.jpg&cd=2021-11-01T20%3A10%3A03.514Z)
![Sport](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=500&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F4gm5VY0fO0qMWa2Arw1XhO%2Fe5af31d6446713fdd5315ed6f7326bb5%2Fbeach-volley.jpg&cd=2021-11-01T20%3A10%3A03.514Z)

# Sport

Play Beach Volley, Beach Tennis and Foot Volley on our unique warm, soft and warm white sand!

![](data:image/jpg;base64,)
![Haven Kakumäe Beach Arena](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=467&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F4KHFaG8QcliQX2Bm16GVhT%2F0ca8caa6dd98140735d6ce4fc3595f0d%2FIMG_9739.JPG&cd=2021-11-01T20%3A10%3A21.896Z)
![Haven Kakumäe Beach Arena](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=467&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F4KHFaG8QcliQX2Bm16GVhT%2F0ca8caa6dd98140735d6ce4fc3595f0d%2FIMG_9739.JPG&cd=2021-11-01T20%3A10%3A21.896Z)

# Haven Kakumäe Beach Arena

We welcome you to our Beach Arena at Haven Kakumäe yacht marina from May to September! The arena hosts a great oppurtunity to play beach volley, beach tennis and footvolley on up to 6 outside courts.

There is an option to buy and rent training equipment on site, including beach volleyballs, beact tennis rackets and balls, sand socks etc.

Come enjoy the fun atmosphere and get your sport on!

![](data:image/jpg;base64,)
![Beachboard Hacienda Tenerife](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=603&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F41pVPrVgrjxdhxsrawAXxy%2F873cbd0a59cf6a593a874bda5cfd5783%2FBeachboard_Hacienda_pool_side__relaxing-rajattu.jpeg&cd=2025-08-19T11%3A44%3A48.357Z)
![Beachboard Hacienda Tenerife](/.netlify/images?w=750&h=603&fm=jpg&q=75&url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fxbk2l7s9u7ck%2F41pVPrVgrjxdhxsrawAXxy%2F873cbd0a59cf6a593a874bda5cfd5783%2FBeachboard_Hacienda_pool_side__relaxing-rajattu.jpeg&cd=2025-08-19T11%3A44%3A48.357Z)

# Beachboard Hacienda Tenerife

Five star practice facility for top athletes and beach volley enthusiasts of all levels. A Unique five stars beach volley heaven located in Tenerife, offering World tour level beach volley courts, outdoor gym and relaxing areas and accommodation with all inclusive service.

Book your spot at our training camp or lets design a customized beach volleyball holiday your training group

![Teras Beach](https://images.ctfassets.net/6ag9zos91onm/3W2odpVWcJUKDwqGegpBKz/866d2b18fb17349c1ccc14274f8a1570/teras-logo.svg)

Tallinn

# Teras Beach Tallinn

**Teras Beach Tallinn** is a unique beach sports and leisure centre, which many beach sports athletes have considered to be the best indoor beach in the world. The indoor temperature is 26 degrees and we have white sand, a spacious lounge, and saunas. You can play beach volleyball and tennis.

In addition to beach sports, Teras Beach Tallinn offers truly memorable events: seminars, company parties, birthdays, bachelor and bachelorette parties, fashion shows, etc. The only limit to organising the most special event is your imagination!

![public.entry.region.yldine_piirkond_tallinn](/next_images/regions/autumn/location=yldine_piirkond_tallinn.svg)

# Ask For an Offer

Find Teras sales teams contact information and the inquiry form here!

# OUTDOOR EVENTS

**Unforgettable beach party on Haven Kakumäe!**

Memrable outdoor events wiht on a turnkey basis are offered by Teras Beach to Haven Kakumaa: Catering, different sports, Dj, Drinks, Sauna, an intense beach party with a performer - You name it and we make it happen!

Possible activities

Ask for an offer! Contact our sales team directly or write to [info@terasbeach.ee](mailto:info@terasbeach.ee)
